title: List Execution Status For Scheduled Order
description: Retrieves the execution status for the given scheduled order id.

scheduledOrderId.description: The ID of the scheduled order.

limit.description: Specifies the number of execution status to be retrieved starting from offset. In case this is not present, the complete list of execution status for the scheduled order is returned.

q.description: This field specifies the query used to filter the execution status returned. Defaults to RQL. To use SCIM use the queryFormat parameter.
